AI Description: vcf2maf is a tool that annotates variants in VCF files with Variant Effect Predictor (VEP) and converts them to Mutation Annotation Format (MAF). It helps in interpreting and analyzing genetic variants in the context of known genomic annotations.
Core Features: Annotates variants with VEP, converts VCF files to MAF format, provides detailed annotations for genetic variants, supports various genomic annotations and databases.
General Tags: Bioinformatics, Variant Annotation, Genetic Variants, Annotation Tool
